iipda:rdbms.iipda:content: SELECT DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_CD docDataElementCode FROM DOCUMENT_DATA_ELEMENT_CD DDEC Dialect.getFetchRowExpression(1, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_CD)

SELECT DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_CD docDataElementCode, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_OBTN_METH_CD docDataObtndMthd, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_FRMT_CD docDataElmFrmt, DDEC.DATA_RTRV_CD dataRetriever, DDEC.AGRE_TYP_CD agrmntType, DDEC.AGRE_SUBTYP_CD agrmntSubType, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_NM dataElmName, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_DESC dataElmDesc, DDEF.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_FRMT_NM dataElmFormatName, DDOM.DOCM_DATA_OBTN_METH_NM dataElmObtainedMethodName, DDEC.DATA_TYP_CD dataElmDataTypeCode, DDEF.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_FRMT_DESC dataElmFrmtDescription, DDEF.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_FRMT_SAMPL_DESC dataElmFrmtSampleDescription, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_GRP_CD dataElmGroupCode, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_TYP_CD dataElementTypeCode, DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_XML_NM docDataXMLId, ATC.DOCM_AGRE_TYP_XML_NM agreementTypeXMLId, DDEGC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_GRP_XML_NM groupCodeXMLId FROM DOCUMENT_DATA_ELEMENT_CD DDEC JOIN DOCUMENT_DATA_ELEMENT_FRMT_CD DDEF ON DDEF.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_FRMT_CD = DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_FRMT_CD JOIN DOCUMENT_DATA_OBTAIN_METHOD_CD DDOM ON DDOM.DOCM_DATA_OBTN_METH_CD = DDEC.DOCM_DATA_OBTN_METH_CD JOIN DOCUMENT_AGREEMENT_TYPE_CD ATC ON ATC.AGRE_TYP_CD = DDEC.AGRE_TYP_CD JOIN DOCUMENT_DATA_ELEMENT_GROUP_CD DDEGC ON DDEC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_GRP_CD = DDEGC.DOCM_DATA_ELEM_GRP_CD WHERE (DDEC.EFF_DTM >= :curdatetime OR DDEC.END_DTM is null)

SELECT a.CLM_NO claimNumber, a.CLM_LOSS_DT lossDate, c.CLM_LOSS_TYP_NM lossType, d.CLLA_LOC_NM lossLocation, h.PARTY_PERS_NM_NM_DISP_DRV insuredName, i.PARTY_ADDR_LN1_TXT insuredAddressLine1, i.PARTY_ADDR_LN2_TXT insuredAddressLine2, i.PARTY_ADDR_CITY_NM insuredCity, k.PSTL_SERV_RGN_NM insuredState, i.PARTY_ADDR_PSTL_CD insuredZip, SUM(m.DSB_AMT) paidAmount FROM CLAIM a, CLAIM_RESERVE_NC b, CLAIM_LOSS_TYPE_CD c, CLAIM_LOSS_LOCATION_ADDR d, CLAIM_FINANCIAL_TRAN_CLM e, FINANCIAL_TRANSACTION_CLAIM f, CLAIM_PARTICIPATION g, PARTY_PERSON_NAME h, PARTY_ADDRESS i, PARTY_ADDRESS_USAGE j, POSTAL_SERVICE_REGION_CD k, DISBURSEMENT_PAYABLE_DRV l, DISBURSEMENT m, DISBURSEMENT_STATUS n WHERE a.CLM_ID = b.CLM_ID_DRV AND b.CLM_LOSS_TYP_CD = c.CLM_LOSS_TYP_CD AND a.CLM_ID = d.CLM_ID AND b.CLM_RSRV_NC_ID=e.CLM_RSRV_NC_ID AND e.FTC_ID = f.FTC_ID AND a.CLM_ID = e.CLM_ID AND a.CLM_ID=g.CLM_ID AND g.PARTY_ID=h.PARTY_ID AND g.PTCP_TYP_CD='insrd' AND g.PARTY_ID=i.PARTY_ID AND i.PARTY_ADDR_ID=j.PARTY_ADDR_ID AND j.USG_TYP_CD = 'mail_addr' AND j.AGRE_TYP_CD = 'clm' AND j.PARTY_ADDR_USG_END_DT IS NULL AND j.PARTY_ADDR_USG_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND h.PARTY_PERS_NM_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND h.PARTY_PERS_NM_END_DT IS NULL AND h.DEL_IND = 'n' AND h.PERS_NM_TYP_CD = 'lgl_nm' AND g.CLM_PTCP_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND g.CLM_PTCP_END_DT IS NULL AND g.DEL_IND = 'n' AND i.PSTL_SERV_RGN_ID = k.PSTL_SERV_RGN_ID AND a.DEL_IND = 'n' AND e.FTC_ID = l.FTC_ID AND l.DSB_ID = n.DSB_ID AND l.DSB_ID = m.DSB_ID AND n.EFF_DTM > :beginDate AND n.EFF_DTM <= :endDate AND n.END_DTM IS NULL AND n.DSB_STS_RSN_CD = 'snt_pay_prcssr' GROUP BY a.CLM_NO, a.CLM_LOSS_DT, c.CLM_LOSS_TYP_NM, d.CLLA_LOC_NM, h.PARTY_PERS_NM_NM_DISP_DRV, i.PARTY_ADDR_LN1_TXT, i.PARTY_ADDR_LN2_TXT, i.PARTY_ADDR_CITY_NM, k.PSTL_SERV_RGN_NM, i.PARTY_ADDR_PSTL_CD
iipda:rdbms.iipda:description: Retrieve Payments made within Date range for CLUE REPORT

iipda:rdbms.iipda:content: SELECT clm.CLM_ID claimId, clm.CLM_NO claimNumber FROM CLAIM clm, CLAIM_CHANGE_TRACKING cct WHERE clm.CLM_ID = cct.CLM_CHG_TRK_PK_ID AND cct.CLM_CHG_TRK_AUDT_DTM > (SELECT COALESCE((SELECT BTCH_LST_RUN_DT FROM BATCH_LAST_RUN_DATE WHERE BTCH_JOB_TYP_CD = 'ClaimExport'),'1990-01-01') FROM CYCLE_SYSTEM_DATE WHERE BUSN_DT_TYP_CD = 'busn_dt') Dialect.getFetchRowExpression(5, null)
iipda:rdbms.iipda:description: Retrieve updated claims from the last batch run date.
